main event: A civilian observed a yellow elliptical object in Tolland, Massachusetts in July 1968.
interesting points: The object was reported to be yellow and elliptical in shape., The observation lasted for about 2 minutes without any discernible sound., The observer was convinced of the accuracy of the sighting but a report indicated more probable explanations were available., The object came in ascending and was lost sight of after two minutes., Another sighting described a red disc-shaped object hovering briefly before disappearing.
